/* * The x-instance of Foo. */ const x = new Foo(); /** * The y-instance of Foo. */ const y = new Foo(); // Binary const z = x * y; // z: Foo const a = 6 * x; // a: Foo const b = x * 6; // b: Foo const c = 6 * 6; // c: number const d = x + y; const e = 6 + y; const f = x + 6; const g = 6 + 6; const h = x - y; // Unary Prefix const p = +x; // p: Foo const q = -x; // q: Foo const r = ~x; // r: Foo const s = !x; // s: boolean
/* * The Foo class. */ class Foo { /** * */ size: number; /** * */ name: number; /** * Constructs a Foo. */ constructor() { } /** * The greet method... */ greet(): string { return `Hello, ${this.name}`; } }
